repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a manuscript of a commentary on the Siddhāntalakṣaṇa which is a Nyāya text. Name of the commentary is not mentioned in the manuscript. Something is scibbled in Telugu script in black ink on the front guard folio.

msItem.title: Siddhāntalakṣaṇaṭīkā

filiation.p: Aufrecht Catalogus vol. 1 p-720 New Catalogus Catalogorum vol.39 pp-137-140

msItem.incipit: (1v 1) yāvat sṃyogābhāvā [t] (t is added inter linear addition) nityādi pratyayāt ekarūpāvacchinnasya pratiyogyabhāvādhikaraṇatāvacchedakatva virodhāt ekasyāpi viśeṣarūpasāmānyarūpā (1v 2) bhyām ….

support.p: Palma leaf is used as guard folio. The front guard folio is Fragile. It is broken at the right margin. Two palm leaves are used together to strengthen the folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin on the verso of the folio. Last folio unnumbered.
supportDesc.condition: Good, except last two folio are broken at the margin so folio numering is damaged.

handNote.desc: Neatly written but sometimes last lines are without ink. e.g Folio 1v last line. Folio 50v last two lines.

additions.desc: Number 97 written in red ink on the fron guard folio.

encodingDesc.p: Last folio numer is supplied. Spaces are added to separated words.

TEI.text: 1v 1yāvat sṃyogābhāvā [t] (t is added inter linear addition) nityādi pratyayāt ekarūpāvacchinnasya pratiyogyabhāvādhikaraṇatāvacchedakatva virodhāt ekasyāpi viśeṣarūpasāmānyarūpā 1v 2 bhyām …. [51r 9] yogitātanniṣṭhatvopagamāditi iti siddhāntalakṣaṇam
